content:
ProjectCollection+ProjectAddedEventHandler Delegate

In this Article

Handler to receive which project got added to the project collection.

Syntax

Declaration

public delegate void ProjectCollection.ProjectAddedEventHandler(object sender, ProjectCollection.ProjectAddedToProjectCollectionEventArgs e);

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Delegate
  • ProjectCollection+ProjectAddedEventHandler
